text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Ah!? I think I just came up with a great
idea!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yep, I have a bad feeling about this. 
But let's hear it.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I call it "Operation Replace All the
Posters on the Bulletin Board With Turbo
Posters"!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Heehee… Then everyone will give Turbo 
praise and attention……!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ohohoo～～! Turbo's such a genius! Nature, let's start making Turbo posters!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Okay, hold your horsepower. You can
make your own posters all you want, but
the student council will get mad if you
mess with the bulletin board without
permission.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Ehh!? They'll get mad at me!? 
No, no! I don't want thaaat～!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
That's right. So just stay put 
and give up on ——

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Understood! Then I'll make a new
bulletin board next to it…… one
specially for me! And it has to be
really huge!!! Help me get a bunch of
trees from the fields, Nature!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Mmm…… I do like that you don't give up 
easily, but let me explain that again.
